Name: In The Bag
About the game: 'I n the bag ' is puzzle game, where your main goal is to beat your coleague John,(who is very competative), in competition for employee of the month. You will be abble to customise your character and just simply start your work journey. Your character is working in a small supermarket as a bag packer. Your job is to pack customers shopping into the bag as fast as possible during your daily shift. Each customer is different and comes with randomly selected events (mobility restriction, physics symulation,...) obstractles and increasing difficulty, which might test your strenght and deduction skills. There are three different abilities, which can help you to achieve your daily goals, but you have to earn them with hard work. Your goal should be to beath John and win title 'Employee of the month' which comes with trophy and also your personal picture hanging by the main entrance to the supermarket. Features -score based system -3 different difficulty options -increasing difficulty over play time -simple character customisation to personalise your avatar -randomly selected events
